name: MEC Calefaction Arm Warmers - Unisex
description:
These compact arm warmers are splendid for cool and cold weather cycling. Stow them in your pocket when the day warms up. Motion-friendly stretch fabric is brushed on the inside for warmth and comfort.Black fabric is a blend of 86% nylon, 14% spandex. Coloured fabric is 83% polyester and 17% spandex.Slightly articulated elbow.Flat-locked seams.Silicone grippers at biceps to prevent slipping.Reflective MEC logo for visibility.XS arm warmers measure 20cm around the circumference at bicep and 44cm long at the underarm seam; Small measures 22cm at bicep, 47cm long; Medium measures 25cm at bicep, 50cm long; Large measures 27cm at bicep, 51cm long; XL measures 30cm at bicep, 52cm long.

        Sustainability
